thought: The website is accessible. Now I need to extract text from the HTML to analyze its content.
observation: Bull Bitcoin  Bitcoin Support by Bull Bitcoin Toggle Menu Payments VIP Bull Bitcoin Prime Support EN Français Sign Up Login Individuals Businesses Help using a Bitcoin Wallet Instructions for Bull Bitcoin Rates Take control of your money. Bull Bitcoin is a non-custodial Bitcoin-only exchange and payments service — Bitcoin done right! welcomes you to Bull Bitcoin! GET STARTED Already have an account? Log in. Bull Bitcoin Services Buy Bitcoin directly to your own Bitcoin Wallet using e-mail money transfers and other Canadian bank transfer options. Non-custodial Instant withdrawal No withdrawal fees EXCHANGE FEATURES Pay your bills with Bitcoin We are Canada’s first and largest Bitcoin payment processing service. Receive dollars in your bank account Send dollars to someone else’s bank account Pay off any Canadian credit card The recipient doesn’t PAYMENTS FEATURES Prime is a VIP advisory service for high-net-worth individuals, corporations, and institutions looking to take their Bitcoin journey to the next level. Unlimited transaction volumes Corporate treasury and business payments Dedicated phone support with management PRIME BitcoinSupport.com Learn how to self-custody your bitcoin with our DIY guides, or hire our experts to walk you through the entire process from wallet setup, to receiving your bitcoin. BITCOINSUPPORT.COM Mission and ideology Our mission is to accelerate the rise of the Bitcoin Standard 100% self-funded Bitcoin Maximalists: we never touched shitcoins Cypherpunks OUR TEAM Trusted since 2013 Since our founding in 2013 at the Bitcoin Embassy in Montreal, our team has been prolific in promoting Bitcoin education and adoption in Canada. Francis Pouliot, CEO and Founder of Bull Bitcoin, is globally recognized as an uncorruptible pioneer of Bitcoin. Customer Support We understand that buying and selling Bitcoin using your own Bitcoin wallet can be confusing and stressful. Our customer support team will assist you every step of the way using our online chat platform (fully confidential). CONTACT US NOW Embark on your Bitcoin Journey Let Bull Bitcoin guide you every step of the way Create your own Bitcoin wallet At Bull Bitcoin, you bring your own wallet. We never hold your Bitcoin, but we can hold your hand! Learn how to create, secure and manage your Bitcoin wallet. Acquire Bitcoin Create an account Send a bank transfer Receive Bitcoin in your wallet Our world renowned bitcoin support team will be there to help you every step of the way. BUY BITCOIN Spend Bitcoin Bitcoin is not only the best way to save value over time. It is also the best payment mechanism ever created. Learn how and where to spend Bitcoin with our payment services. SPEND BITCOIN Become Sovereign Taking control over your own money comes with a new set of responsabilities: Safeguard your Bitcoin from loss Protect your Bitcoin from theft We offer 1-on-1 consultations designed to help you become financially sovereign. Reviews Hear from our customers The most trusted way to buy bitcoin by far. They make it incredibly easy - my wire transfer was accepted right away and the whole transaction was effortless. I know these guys personally and transparency is key. Would recommend. Ruz du Plooy I was extremely satisfied with Bull Bitcoin. I sold Bitcoins on a Sunday and I had the money in my personal checking account on Monday morning! Also, another time I had a major security issue (unrelated to Bull Bitcoin) as I had lost basically my wallet access on another app and was truly in panic mode and they called me on a Friday evening to give me some tips on what to do and with their help I was able to import my wallet on the same evening, relieving a great stress. Their messaging system is also very responsive, you normally get an answer very quickly. These guys are number one for a reason! Jeremie Martin I bought a support package with a coldcard from Bull Bitcoin. It was a great experience. During the support call I learned a lot about self custody. I’m very grateful for the knowledge, thank you! JB J Braun Great customer service! The team was truely helpful, I felt I could ask them anything and they always had the answer. Will do business with them again for sure! Antoine Deslauriers I have been using Bull Bitcoin (and Bylls.com, their other site) for years, and sending/receiving Canadian dollars when buying/selling Bitcoin has always worked quickly and reliably. Odi Kosmatos Great for buying Bitcoin and sending it to your own self-hosted wallet. You can easily set up a recurring buy to dollar cost average (DOA) or buy whenever you like. I used the Bylls service to pay my internet bill and it worked perfectly. Bull Bitcoin doesn't bother with alt-coins or the latest token du jour. Just the good stuff David Ellis I have been using BullBitcoin for several years. User support is fast and efficient. You can also pay anything with Bylls. You can also DCA on different addresses. Definitely the best Canadian service (if not worldwide). Sebastien Ruel This exchange does not hold your private keys (Not your keys, not your Bitcoin), nor do they sell any altcoins (tired of seeing people get rekt. This aligns with my values toward this industry. RW Robert Weaver They are amazing the customer service is fast they took the time to explain me everything to set my account and all the prosses whit my bank account has a French Canadian i really appreciate their French service. For all that I only do my transaction with bullbitcoin and bylls JF Jean-Francois Bullbitcoin is literally saving the lives of Canadians. By far the best platform for purchasing bitcoin, likely anywhere in the world, but the fact their owners ensure they are always bitcoin-only puts them in a league of their own. This is a legendary company run by legendary humans. There’s nothing more to be said. Buy bitcoin. TR Travis Latest Blog Posts Opinion Essay News 6 mins about 21 hours ago Bitcoin Drain in the USA Bitcoin in the USA - a hot bed for adoption and innovation, but a minefield for regulation. Bull Bitcoin's CEO and Founder, Francis Pouliot breaks down how Bitcoin is redefining the regulatory notions of custody and what it means to operate a Bitcoin business under US jurisdiction. Francis Pouliot CEO 20 days ago The Bitcoin ETF Debate: Insights and Implications from TD Bank's Latest Video Has TD Bank swallowed the Orange Pill? Well, kind of... the major bank's recent video explains the upcoming halving and potential supply shock caused by ETFs but zero discussion of self-custody. Nice try! thought: The website seems to be a legitimate Bitcoin exchange service with a focus on self-custody and Bitcoin education. There are no characteristics of a scam website based on the content and status code of the URL. {
